(Photo: Lionel Cironneau, AP) 95 CONNECT COMMENT EMAIL MORE 
The year has not gotten off to the best start for Mischa Barton. 
In January, The O.C. actress was hospitalized the night of her birthday after someone spiked her drink with GHB . 
On Tuesday, her lawyer, Lisa Bloom, had to issue a statement threatening anyone "shopping around" sexually explicit photos of Barton, whom she says "was recorded without her consent by someone she was seeing at the time." 
Bloom continued, "There's a name for this disgusting conduct: revenge pornography," adding that it's a form of sexual assault and considered a matter for both criminal and civil courts in California. She promised to use every law available to her to prosecute the culprit. 
"I have a message for anyone who attempts to traffic in these photos or video of Ms. Barton," she concluded, issuing a Taken -style warning: "We will find you and we will come after you. You proceed at your peril." Read or Share this story: http://usat.ly/2nnxrk2
